short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool captures screenshots and uses AI to quickly provide insights, summaries, and solutions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screenova is a Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience by allowing users to capture web page screenshots and use advanced AI and Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology to extract, analyze, and transform text. Key features include generating explanations, summaries, and action items from screenshots, solving questions efficiently, and offering model selection from tools like ChatGPT 3.5 and 4. This tool simplifies workflow and boosts productivity by providing quick insights and text extraction from images.
